scripts.init: npm run certs && npm run mongodb && npm run pm2
scripts.postcerts: npm run certs:nginx && npm run certs:renew
scripts.certs:init: apt update && apt upgrade -y && apt install letsencrypt -y
scripts.certs:nginx: apt update && apt upgrade -y && apt install nginx -y && cp ./nginx/api.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/api.conf && nginx -s reload
scripts.certs:renew: echo '* 5 * * * service nginx stop & letsencrypt renew & service nginx start' >> /etc/crontab
scripts.pm2: npm run pm2:install && npm run pm2:start && npm run pm2:startup
scripts.mongodb: npm run mongodb:key && npm run mongodb:source && npm run mongodb:install && npm run mongodb:start
scripts.mongodb:source: echo 'deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu xenial/mongodb-org/3.6 multiverse' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.6.list
scripts.mongodb:install: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y mongodb-org
scripts.mongodb:start: sudo service mongod start && systemctl enable mongod
